meanings.definition: Animals that live within the substrate of a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The infauna in the lake includes small worms and clams.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the infauna to understand the ecosystem better.
meanings.sent3: The infauna threw a party underground, and even the fish were invited!
meanings.sent4: The infauna, hidden from view, are like the secret keepers of the lake.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the infauna world is like discovering a hidden treasure chest.

meanings.definition: The community of organisms that live within the sediment of a marine environment.
meanings.sent1: Divers observed the infauna thriving in the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: The infauna plays a crucial role in the health of the seabed.
meanings.sent3: The infauna community organized a talent show under the sand.
meanings.sent4: The infauna, like a bustling city beneath the waves, never sleeps.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the infauna world beneath the waves is mesmerizing.
